title: Was CA Wines required to close internal operations while Newsom remained open?
subtitle: Commercial operations shrank in the summer of 2020 with the prevalence of COVID-19 cases in the provinces across California.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: California Goof. In July 2020, the Gavn Neosom Khrm factory in Napa County remained open even when other companies were asked to close their internal operations around the state.
